hibernate-mapping.query: from AclObjectIdentity identity where identity.domainObjectId=? and aclObjClass.className=?
from AclSid where upper(sidType.type) like ? and ownerSid in (select id from User where userName like ?) and aclObjectIdentity.domainObjectId=? and permission in(:param_3)
from AclSid where upper(sidType.type) like ? and aclObjectIdentity.domainObjectId=? and ownerSid in(select id from RoleImpl where roleName in(:param_2)) and permission in(:param_3)
from UserRole where user.id =? and role in (:param_1)
hibernate-mapping.sql-query: select mask from acl_entry entry, acl_object_identity identity where entry.acl_object_identity= identity.id and identity.object_id_identity=?

select sid.owner_sid, sid.sid_type from acl_object_identity identity , acl_sid sid where identity.id= sid.object_identity_id and identity.object_id_identity = ? and identity.object_id_class=(select id from acl_class where class like ?)
